content: 2 round 4 ch1 single_crochet in each double_crochet around join with slip_stitch cut the yarn and weave in the ends do the same on both sleeves bottom of jacket if you would like to lengthen the bottom of the jacket begin at one of the bottom front corners and double_crochet around to the second front corner ch3 turn and double_crochet around the bottom of the jacket again continue until the jacket is as long as you would like it to be cut the yarn and weave in the ends if you are not going to do the cuffs then single_crochet around the opening of each sleeve for the main body of the jacket start at one of the bottom corners and single_crochet around the edge of the jacket buttonholes when you get to the point where you would like the buttonhole to be on the jacket pictured it is 4 in from the top single_crochet 3 chain 4 slip_stitch into the 4th single_crochet from the chain forming a loop picture 4 single_crochet in the chain loop slip_stitch into the same space as the single_crochet at the beginning of the loop you can add as many buttonholes as suits you continue single_crochet edging around the jacket ending with a slip_stitch in the beginning single_crochet weave in ends chart 1 corner 2 double_crochet in ch2 space ch2 2 double_crochet in ch2 space chart 2 beginning and end of round beginning chain 3 double_crochet into same st double_crochet in each double_crochet across end double_crochet in each double_crochet until the beginning ch3 at the start of the round slip_stitch into top of beginning ch3 to join *charts made using crochet charts by stitch works software pictures are on the following two pages slip_stitch into the top of beginning ch3 to complete the row double_crochet into same st as slip_stitch pieces folded before seaming wrong sides facing whipstitch through both loops seam as seen from back of sweater seam as seen from inside of sweater chain 4 slip_stitch into 4th single_crochet from beginning of chain 4 single_crochet across chain loop slip_stitch in single_crochet then single_crochet until edging is finished sleeve with cuff sleeve without cuff
